title: Radio 1's Treasure Hunt is on! Here's how to get your hands on one of Greg's golden tickets
text:
Want a pass to Radio 1’s Big Weekend 2020, the sold-out Glastonbury 50th anniversary AND Reading or Leeds Festival?

Greg James has a golden ticket, well four actually, to get you and a mate in, but here's the catch, when somebody finds one the others will be destroyed.

A golden ticket will be hidden in four different locations around the UK, and Greg will be revealing clues about their whereabouts throughout Radio 1 Breakfast on Thursday 24th October at 7:30am.

The nation's biggest treasure hunt is on!
